description: This file defines an authentication service class 'AuthService' that provides methods for user registration, login, logout, and token validation, utilizing external API client, secure storage, and user model.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Service class providing authentication functionalities such as login, registration, logout, and token validation.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and name, returning the user object upon success.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, storing the token and returning user info.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by clearing stored credentials.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if the user has a valid stored token, indicating authentication status.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles errors from Dio HTTP requests and returns error messages.
